DESCRIPTION: Verify search results page structure is intact.
NAME: test_search_results_page_loads

DESCRIPTION: Verify Unicode input (emoji, CJK) is handled gracefully.
NAME: test_search_unicode_characters

DESCRIPTION: Verify product page displays a valid price.
NAME: test_product_page_has_price

DESCRIPTION:
Navigate to a product page, read the UI selling price,
then query the inventory API for the same product ID.
Assert they match within tolerance.
NAME: test_pdp_price_matches_api_price

DESCRIPTION:
Verify displayed total matches sum of individual item prices.

This is the most critical pricing check â€” catches:
- Stale price caches
- Rounding errors in tax/discount calculations
- Frontend-backend price mismatches
NAME: test_cart_total_matches_item_sum

DESCRIPTION: Verify empty cart page shows appropriate message.
NAME: test_empty_cart_shows_message

DESCRIPTION: Verify gibberish search shows no-results state or fallback.
NAME: test_search_gibberish_returns_no_results_or_fallback

DESCRIPTION: Verify a product can be removed from the cart.
NAME: test_remove_product_from_cart

DESCRIPTION: Verify product page displays a title.
NAME: test_product_page_has_title

DESCRIPTION: Verify a product can be added to the cart.
NAME: test_add_product_to_cart

DESCRIPTION: Verify Nykaa homepage loads without errors.
NAME: test_homepage_loads_successfully

DESCRIPTION: Verify cart displays item prices.
NAME: test_cart_shows_product_price

DESCRIPTION: Verify site handles a 500-character search query.
NAME: test_search_very_long_query

DESCRIPTION: Verify SQL injection-style input is handled safely.
NAME: test_search_sql_injection_string

DESCRIPTION: Verify that applying a filter changes the results.
NAME: test_results_change_after_filter

DESCRIPTION: Verify site handles XSS-style input safely.
NAME: test_search_xss_string

DESCRIPTION: Verify search bar is visible after popup dismissal.
NAME: test_search_bar_is_visible

DESCRIPTION: Verify that filter/sidebar section appears on search results.
NAME: test_search_results_have_filter_section

DESCRIPTION:
Verify the price shown on PDP matches the price in cart.

Catches: CDN caching issues, price update propagation delays.
NAME: test_product_price_matches_cart_price

DESCRIPTION: Verify navigating to an invalid product URL doesn't crash.
NAME: test_invalid_product_url

DESCRIPTION: Verify Nykaa logo/header image is present.
NAME: test_logo_is_present
